name: smelt_iron_ingots
goal: Refine raw iron into iron ingots
notes: Use (params.count) to determine what 'X' and 'Y' item counts should be.

steps.title: Smelt Iron Ingots
steps.details: Place 'X' amount of raw_iron in the top slot of the furnace and 'Y' amount of coal in the bottom slot. Smelt all raw_iron into iron_ingot. Withdraw all iron_ingot when they are finished. (Recommended for pipeline: 9 iron ingots).
